title: Pull request merge from banilo/nilearn:ex_indeximg to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: This is great thanks Danilo, the example now look much cleaner, and we have lost 7 lines of code (which is a good indication that this is going in the right direction).
I guess this unneeded nibabel import may be in other examples, would you mind double-checking?
title: (None, '', u'examples/connectivity/plot_canica_resting_state.py')

text:
I agree it's not super consistent but in examples, import are generally close to the code where they are needed to make in order to have an interactive session feel, where you import stuff where you realise you need them.

So maybe move this import below the `### Restrict to faces and houses` comment
title: (None, '', u'examples/decoding/plot_haxby_searchlight.py')

text: A good way to do that for example: `pyflakes examples | grep nibabel`
title: (None, '', u'examples/connectivity/plot_canica_resting_state.py')

text: FWIW `flake8 examples | grep nibabel` is probably better since it is going to give you PEP8 warnings as well.
title: (None, '', u'examples/connectivity/plot_canica_resting_state.py')
